text:
Super découverte!!  Plats savoureux au goût du Pérou.  Spécial du lundi et mardi: 29$ pour 3 services.  

C'est un resto apportez votre vin.
This restaurant is in my top three Latin fusion cuisine in US & Canada. The price was right for the food. Service was great!

The best octopus I never had! Is is a small quiet place, but the service is attentive, and the food is very well prepared. It a nice touch to to bring your own wine. The menu choice is rather limited, but the 5 of use all truly our food; the latino accents bring a refreshing touch of sun!. The price is very decent. The only downside was that there was only one dessert choice on the night we were there.
We enjoyed the fresh bread and entrees. Main dishes were good but the octopus tasted reheated.
Le personnel est très sympathique, mais la nourriture manquait de saveur. Le rapport qualité/prix n'y est tout simplement pas.
